Module kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem
Package kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.controller.products

Class AddProductController

java.lang.Object
kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.controller.products.ProductsController
kline.qkmii.inventorymgmtsystem.controller.products.AddProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductController extends ProductsController
Controller class to handle adding a new Product. Inherits from the base class ProductsController. Upon a save event, calls a validation method and adds the product to Inventory.allProducts.
Author:
Timothy Albert Kline

  • Method Details

    • handleSaveBtnEvent

      public void handleSaveBtnEvent(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles saving a new product. Calls validateInput() to verify user inputs are correct before adding a new product to Inventory.allProducts. Calls createProduct to create a new product from user input. Returns to menu view if succeeds.
      Specified by:
      handleSaveBtnEvent in class ProductsController
      Parameters:
      event - save button click. To redirect back to menu.
      Throws:
      Exception - if error logged from validateInputs(). Prevents adding product to Inventory.allProducts.
      See Also:
      • ProductsController.validateInputs()
      • SceneManager.returnToMenu(ActionEvent)
